sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"打破，弄碎"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: break, burst, crack, crush, fracture, shatter, smash
means: break ： 常用词，含义广泛，多指猛然用力将坚硬物打破或损坏。
burst ： 指某物因内部外部压力过大而出现严重破裂、爆开或账破。
crack ： 多指因长期使用或经受压力，物体表现呈现裂纹、裂口或破裂、裂开，但一般没成碎片。
crush ： 指用力把东西压破或变形。
fracture ： 比crack的破裂程度更深更严重，常指断裂，医学上指骨折。
shatter ： 指破裂为许多支离破碎的碎片，多用指易碎事物。
smash ： 指突然而猛烈地重击某物，使之破碎或完全变形。

sentence.Network_en: A failure would shatter the hopes of many people.
sentence.Network_cn: 一次失败会使很多人希望破灭。

sentence.Network_en: The words lashed against Chueh - hui's brain till he thought it would shatter.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些字像许多根皮鞭接连地打着 觉慧 的头,他觉得他的头快要破碎了.

sentence.Network_en: He could shatter airs and " respectability " with deadly sarcasm.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能以无情的讽刺来粉碎派头和 “ 体面 ”.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'scatter, disperse'): perhaps imitative; compare with scatter

encyclopedia.content: 破碎砖块 中文名称:破碎砖块 英文名称:Shatter 游戏类型:STG 射击游戏 发行时间:2010年 制作发行:Sidhe Interactive 1UP Game 配置要求 o OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher o Processor: 2.0 GHz+ single-core or dual-core (any speed) o Memory: 512 MB o Hard Drive: 250 MB of free space o Graphics: 128MB dedicated graphics processor with shader model 2 support (e.g. NVIDIA GeForce FX 5600 or ATi Radeon 9600) o Soun

entry.def: If something shatters or is shattered, it breaks into a lot of small pieces.

example.ex: ...safety glass that won't shatter if it's broken...
example.tran: 被打破后也不会碎裂的安全玻璃

example.ex: The car shattered into a thousand burning pieces in a 200mph crash...
example.tran: 汽车在时速为 200 英里时发生撞车，炸成了数以千计燃烧的碎片。

entry.tran: 使(梦想、希望或信念)粉碎;(使)破灭
entry.def: If something shatters your dreams, hopes, or beliefs, it completely destroys them.

example.ex: A failure would shatter the hopes of many people...
example.tran: 一次失败会使很多人希望破灭。

example.ex: Something like that really shatters your confidence.
example.tran: 那样的事情会让人的信心严重受挫。

entry.tran: 使非常惊愕;使受到极大打击
entry.def: If someone is shattered by an event, it shocks and upsets them very much.

example.ex: He had been shattered by his son's death.
example.tran: 儿子的死让他大受打击。

example.ex: ...the tragedy which had shattered his life.
example.tran: 给他的生活造成重创的悲剧

Sentence.sentence: Despite its failure to shatter the glass ceiling,Sweden has one of the most powerful and innovative economies in the world.
A shattering loss of confidence inspires behavior that overwhelms the normal self-correcting mechanisms that usually prevent a recession from becoming deep and prolonged: a depression.

sentences.en: We were shattered to hear of her sudden death.
sentences.cn: 听到她突然死亡的消息我们十分震惊。

sentences.en: The shells became so thin that they shattered before the babies hatched.
sentences.cn: 蛋壳变得这样薄，使得鹰蛋在幼鹰孵化前就碎了。

jushi.english: I dropped the mirror on the floor and it shattered.
jushi.chinese: 我把镜子掉到地上摔碎了。

jushi.english: I feel completely shattered after that running up the hill.
jushi.chinese: 这次爬山以后,我完全精疲力竭了。

jushi.english: We were shattered to hear of her sudden death.
jushi.chinese: 听到她突然死了,我们都感到震惊。
